programme.title: Oscar & Ealasaid
programme.desc: 14/26. A new train that goes directly to the ocean has just opened in town. Célestine would love to go to the sea with Ernest, but the ticket is very expensive.

programme.title: Cleasan Ataidh & Tilidh/The...
programme.desc: ...Adventures of Abney & Teal. 7/52. Abney finds a whistle. When he plays it, a beautiful rainbow appears in the sky.

programme.title: Sionnach agus Maigheach (Fox & Hare)
programme.desc: 14/26. Fox and Hare are throwing a costume party. But who is the mysterious guest in ghost costume?

programme.title: An Là

programme.title: SPFL League 1 - Queen of the South v Alloa Athletic

programme.title: Òran Na Mnà
programme.desc: 5/8. An taghadh aig Karen NicMhathain air òrain is bàrdach a tha a' toirt beachd conaltach air an t-saoghal. Karen Matheson explores the themes of social and political comment.

programme.title: Eòrpa/European Current Affairs
programme.desc: 8/16. Shona MacDonald hears allegations of hundreds of wild sheep being allowed to starve to death every year on St Kilda.

programme.title: Vets: Gach Creutair Beo
programme.desc: 6/8. Cuileanan ann am Farfar, deuchainnean air liopard sneachda is obair lannsa air uilinn cù. A snow leopard gets blood tests, puppies in Forfar and surgery on a boxer dog's elbow.

programme.title: Seirm | Celtic Connections
programme.desc: 3/4. Mary Ann Kennedy presents a music show featuring Ciorstaidh Beaton, Eric Bibb, Loudon Wainwright III, Kíla and Joshua Burnside.

programme.title: Leonardo da Vinci - An...

programme.title: Tatù Rìoghail Armailteach Dhùn Èideann 2024

programme.title: Brothers in Trouble
programme.desc: Drama about a group of illegal Pakistani immigrants in a boarding house in 1960s England. Contains strong language, some sexual content and some violence.

programme.title: Crime and Punishment: The Story of Capital Punishment
programme.desc: Documentary using archive footage to trace the story of the ultimate sanction. Contains some scenes which some viewers may find upsetting.

programme.title: Fred Dibnah's Industrial Age: Iron and Steel
programme.desc: 3/6. Fred traces the development of the production of iron and steel, beginning at Ironbridge.

programme.title: Railways: The Making of a Nation
programme.desc: Documentary series about Britain's railways. A look at how the idea of an excursion to distant places became popular from the 1840s onwards.

programme.title: The Story of Welsh Art
programme.desc: 3/3. Huw Stephens looks at how, as the 20th century dawned, artists found radical new ways to depict Wales, pushing themselves to extremes and redefining what art could be.

programme.title: Thatcher - A Very British Revolution
programme.desc: 1/5. Margaret Thatcher's inner circle reveals how she managed to overcome her outsider status to become a prominent political figure in Britain.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: There once was an Irish pub, named after a big green bug. It was on its last legs, down to the dregs. Welcome to Ramsay's Nightmare club! #NationalPoetryDay

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: It's time to get intimate and go deep, for some it's awks, others a big leap. Time to lay it bare, nothing to hide, but interference makes some pairs collide. #NationalPoetryDay

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge and Lisa debate a feminist ideal. Beauty, brains AND power: illusion or real? Can those three things be combined? Seeking insight from history, what do they find? #NationalPoetryDay

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: When a nearby economy is all out of luck, men head to Springfield looking for work. An honest day's work for an honest day's pay? Not if Mayor Quimby can keep them away. #NationalPoetryDay

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Due to his terrible self-worth, Raj vows to give women a wide berth. Penny tries to teach Sheldon - which is no easy feat. We hope you enjoy this Big Bang repeat. #NationalPoetryDay

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard, Sheldon and Howard talk science. Will they be met with some defiance? Raj plans a date to help Lucy's fears; let's hope this one won't end in tears. #NationalPoetryDay

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: When Phil and Claire are caught in bed, their kids are filled with nothing but dread. Jay and Gloria send an email, but to the wrong person. Epic fail! #NationalPoetryDay

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: To make sure they don't become boring, Claire and Phil have new bed plans that don't involve snoring. And Jay's got a surprise in store, but executing it becomes a chore. #NationalPoetryDay

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard hurls the first pitch at a baseball game, but will his throw just bring him shame? And Sheldon makes a hefty remark; Penny and Leonard think he's missed the mark. #NationalPoetryDay

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Will the guys invest in Stuart's shop; or will their girlfriends throw a strop? From Penny, Emily keeps her distance; how long can she ignore her existence? #NationalPoetryDay

programme.desc: Barting Over: Bart moves into a downtown apartment of his own, and befriends famous skateboarder Tony Hawk (guest starring as himself). Also guest starring Blink-182.

programme.title: The Greatest Showman
programme.desc: (2017) Hugh Jackman, Zac Efron and Michelle Williams star in the Golden-Globe-winning, toe-tapping smash hit musical about the life and times of P.T. Barnum, who created the circus.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: I'm Spelling as Fast as I Can: Lisa wins a place at the Spellympics National Spelling Bee but discovers that it's not as clean-cut a competition as she thought.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A Star Is Born Again: A famous and sultry movie star (guest star Marisa Tomei) swoops into town with eyes for none other than Ned Flanders, making him the envy of Springfield.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Mr Spritz Goes to Washington: Krusty wreaks havoc on the political system after the Simpsons help him to get elected.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Opposites A-Frack: Lisa calls on politician Maxine Lombard to stop Mr Burns' secret fracking operation but is taken aback when Lombard and Burns are attracted to each other.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Simpsorama: In a crossover episode, the Simpsons meet the Planet Express crew from Futurama, who've travelled through time to present-day Springfield to stop a catastrophe.

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox
programme.desc: Gyles Brandreth, Joanna Lumley, Judi Love and Micah Richards are just some of the celebs watching Stranger Things, This Is MY House, Million Pound Pawn, and lots of other great TV.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: On the 'box this time: Squid Game: The Challenge, I'm a Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here!, The Crown, Deal or No Deal, Planet Earth III, Made in Chelsea and Saving Lives at Sea.

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: (2018) Ryan Reynolds returns as the potty-mouthed, can of whup-ass-opening superhero and now he's got buddies to help him take on baddie Josh Brolin in the all-out action comedy sequel.

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: (2018) Dark sci-fi action with Tom Hardy as Marvel's anti-hero. A reporter becomes inhabited by a ferocious extraterrestrial that has its own ideas on how to behave. With Michelle Williams.

programme.title: The Outsiders
programme.desc: (1983) Francis Ford Coppola's seminal brat pack coming-of-age crime drama with Tom Cruise, Patrick Swayze, Ralph Macchio, Matt Dillon and Rob Lowe. Two teenage tribes go to war in Tulsa.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Pool of London
programme.desc: (1951) Bonar Colleano stars in this thriller, as a sailor who police think's a killer. Has he been set up? He goes on the run. Will police find him? Are his days done? #NationalPoetryDay

programme.title: Nothing But the Best
programme.desc: (1964) British comedy with Denholm Elliott and Alan Bates. Jimmy hopes to change when he and Charles become mates, as Charles teaches him how to be one of the greats. #NationalPoetryDay

programme.title: The Wrong Box
programme.desc: (1966) Comedy with a stellar cast. With dosh going to the one who dies last. Who will get the cash? As both brothers clash. Wanting their parents' money fast. #NationalPoetryDay

programme.title: The Frogmen
programme.desc: (1951) Richard Widmark stars as a frogman, whose team really aren't this frogman's fan. But when a torpedo hits the sick bay, can frogman Richard save the day? #NationalPoetryDay

programme.title: Dante's Peak
programme.desc: (1997) Volcanologist Pierce Brosnan warns a town of a coming eruption. But the locals won't evacuate; they don't want the disruption. #NationalPoetryDay

programme.title: See How They Run
programme.desc: (2022) Comic whodunnit set amid a play. A director's been killed and the body's going stiff. Can two cops solve it? With Sam Rockwell, Saoirse Ronan and Reece Shearsmith. #NationalPoetryDay

programme.title: Knives Out
programme.desc: (2019) Quirky whodunnit with Daniel Craig as Benoit Blanc, an eccentric detective. A rich man's been killed and everyone has a motive, so Benoit must be extra perceptive. #NationalPoetryDay

programme.title: Hyde Park on Hudson
programme.desc: (2012) Fact-based drama. It's 1939 and King George VI (Samuel West) and Queen Elizabeth (Olivia Colman) visit president FD Roosevelt (Bill Murray) to secure help against the Nazis.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Black Arrow
programme.desc: (1948) Historical adventure. A man (Louis Hayward) returns from the Wars of the Roses to learn from his uncle that a family friend has killed his father. But is everything as it seems?

programme.title: Gift Horse
programme.desc: (1952) War drama. Trevor Howard plays the captain of an ageing US warship, gifted to the British navy, which is chosen to lead the raid on Saint-Nazaire in 1942. With Richard Attenborough.

programme.title: Young Winston
programme.desc: (1972) Biopic charting the rise of the future PM from battered Harrow pupil to MP via military action on foreign soil. Directed by Richard Attenborough.

programme.title: The Moonraker
programme.desc: (1958) Romantic thriller. George Baker stars as a heroic Cavalier horseman, beating off the Roundhead foe as he single-handedly smuggles the country's aristocracy to safety in France.

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: (2015) Comedy starring Mark Wahlberg, Will Ferrell and Linda Cardellini. A man's living happily with his wife and stepchildren - until the kids' biological dad swaggers back onto the scene.

programme.title: Plane
programme.desc: (2023) Action thriller starring Gerard Butler as an airline pilot who must become a one-man army after crashlanding on an island overrun by bad guys. To survive, he's gonna have to wing it.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
programme.desc: (2019) Quentin Tarantino's darkly comic drama set in 60s LA, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Brad Pitt and Margot Robbie. A failing actor's world collides with the Manson Family.

programme.title: Slow West
programme.desc: (2015) Violent offbeat western starring Kodi Smit-McPhee and Michael Fassbender. A 16-year-old Scottish lad travels to 1870s Colorado on the trail of his true love.

programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: (1984) George C Scott stars in Clive Donner's adaptation of Charles Dickens' classic festive fantasy. The miserly curmudgeon Ebenezer Scrooge is visited by three ghosts of Christmas.

programme.title: Dragonball Evolution
programme.desc: (2009) Martial arts adventure. Justin Chatwin stars as the leader of a mystical band of warriors who are out to save the world from the ancient demon Lord Piccolo. With James Marsters.

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: (1994) Comedy starring Joe Mantegna, Joe Pantoliano and Brian Haley. Inept criminals kidnap a millionaire's baby. But when the boy escapes, there's mayhem as they try to track him down.

programme.title: Fatherhood
programme.desc: (2021) Heartfelt fact-based comedy-drama. Kevin Hart stars as a widower who is suddenly sprung into single fatherhood after his wife dies a day after giving birth.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: (2016) Sci-fi blockbuster sequel starring Jeff Goldblum. Twenty years after Earth repelled a devastating alien invasion, the extraterrestrials return to finish the job.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: (2018) Tom Cruise stars in part six of the action-thriller series. His mission: to stop terrorists from getting their hands on nuclear bombs and unleashing global devastation.

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: (1983) Al Pacino stars in Brian De Palma's classic crime thriller. A Cuban immigrant uses the coaine trade to take what he wants of the American dream. Say hello to my little friend.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine
programme.desc: To the Death: Sisko and the crew of the Defiant team up with loyal Jem'Hadar in order to prevent a bunch of renagades from gaining access to a planetary gateway. (S4, Ep 23)

programme.title: Forensics: Catching The Killer

programme.title: Forensics: Catching The Killer
programme.desc: The Lady in the Lake: Carol Park's body was pulled from a lake more than 20 years after she vanished and the key to the case lay in unique forensics. (S4, ep 3)

programme.title: Grimm

programme.title: World's Most Evil Killers
programme.desc: ...Most Evil Killers. Rodney Alcala: Examining the murderer who appeared on a dating game show in the midst of a killing spree that may have claimed as many as 130 victims.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: The Great Escape: The team prepares to release two servals. But things go awry when one vanishes into Malawi's dangerous capital. Plus, a monkey arrives in a critical condition. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Nature's Fast Attacks
programme.desc: The world's fastest predators can strike and kill in the blink of an eye. Now, with the help of modern high-speed cameras, witness these lightning-fast attacks in deadly detail. (1 of 2)

programme.title: Africa's Hunters
programme.desc: A Leopard's Last Stand: A wise leopard rules the Luangwa Valley, holding her own against lions. But she's about to face her biggest challenge yet - a younger, nomadic female. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: Animal Senses
programme.desc: Sight: One of the most amazing senses in the world, sight helps animals spot their prey - and avoid their predators. Learn how creatures throughout nature harness this gift. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Animal Senses
programme.desc: Hearing: Whether through the air or through water, some animals have evolved to perceive changes in their environment through the sense of hearing. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Impossible Animals
programme.desc: Rainforests: Patrick Ayree examines the rainforest residents that have pushed their bodies to the limit, revealing some of the world's most remarkable behaviours and adaptations. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: Age Of The Big Cats
programme.desc: Follow the stories of the cheetah, the snow leopard and the jaguar, and learn how they survived extinction and evolved into the creatures we know today. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: Cub Camp
programme.desc: The Littlest Cub: Meet Winston, an abandoned cub who bonds with Judy as she nurses him, and then she heartbreakingly has to teach him independence. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: Evolution Earth
programme.desc: Heat: Travel from the Sahara to the outback, where animals are teaching us how to survive in our heating world. Shelter with chimps and hear zebra finches singing to their eggs. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Planet Weird
programme.desc: Fight Club: Watch the cannibalistic Portia spider devour the competition, uncover the bloodthirsty side of cuddly koalas and catch an epic giraffe battle. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: Caught On Dashcam
programme.desc: From brushing up on basic motorway etiquette, to extreme weather that'll make you wish you'd never left the house, we've got it all caught on camera. (S4, ep 3)

programme.title: FILM: Blacklight
programme.desc: Tense action thriller following government agent Liam Neeson who specialises in removing operatives whose covers have been exposed. (2022)

programme.title: FILM: Deadlock
programme.desc: An ex-ranger has to spring into action when Bruce Willis' group of rogue soldiers gain control of a power plant. Tense Sky Original film. (2021)
